ComicInfo.Title: The Artistic Impulse; Breakfast at Billy's; The Funnies; Faggot Story; Whistle and Queenie
ComicInfo.Summary:
We start off with a 14-page Concrete tale titled "The Artistic Impulse," written and illustrated by Paul Chadwick. It brings back the same characters that appeared in the first issue of Dark Horse Presents way back in 1986! Then there's a 6-page story titled "Whistle and Queenie" by girl-hero Megan Kelso! Harvey Pekar tells us about"Breakfast at Billy's" in a 5-page story illustrated by Joe Sacco."Faggot Story" is a 6-page autobio story written by James Sturm and Dan Savage, and illustrated by Jason Waskey. And we cap it off with a page of sick strips from the fevered brain of Ivan Brunetti!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-26 14:30:51. [CVDB41321]
